Dia.Complete with double-sided, engravable cover and skeleton dial, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Gold-Plated Mechanical Pocket Watch 3575-G is an heirloom-quality timepiece with a contemporary edge. A 14K gold-plated brass case and matching curb chain look classic and elegant next to a crisp white outer dial, showcasing black-tone Roman numeral hour markers. A mineral glass crystal provides resistance against wear and tear, while 17-jewel mechanical movement ensures reliability and precision.
